subSubSection.paragraph:
Western Australia :
1 male
, 6.5 mm , dissected, 3 slides, AM P. 91142 , Shenton Bluff, Cape Leveque , Cygnet Bay,
16 ° 28 ' 38 "S
, 123 °02' 38 E, 5.1 m , green calcareous alga
Halimeda
sp.,
22 May 2010
, coll. K.B. Attwood, MI WA 1076 ;
1 female
specimen (damaged gnathopods), AM P. 91141 , Shenton Bluff, Cape Leveque , Cygnet Bay,
16 ° 28 ' 38 "S
, 123 °02' 38 E, 5.1 m , green calcareous alga
Halimeda
sp.,
22 May 2010
, coll. K.B. Attwood, MI WA 1076 .

Remarks. These records extend the distribution of
Q. micheli
further east into the Indian Ocean, from Mauritius to Cocos (Keeling) Islands and Western Australia .
